original_text: And this is how she would go to the king: Anything she wanted was given her to take with her from the harem to the king’s palace.
korean_text: 처녀가 왕에게 나아갈 때에는 그가 구하는 것을 다 주어 후궁에서 왕궁으로 가지고 가게 하고

sentences.original_text: And this is how she would go to the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것이 그녀가 왕에게 가는 방식이었습니다

sentences.original_text: was given her to take with her
from the harem to the king's palace
